trait.name: Berserking Greataxe
entries: {@item +3 greataxe}. In addition, while Kagain is attuned to this weapon, his Hit Point maximum increases by 1 for each of his levels or hit dice (176). Whenever a hostile creature damages Kagain while the axe is in his possession, he must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or go berserk. He can choose to fail this saving throw. While berserk, Kagain gains advantage on all melee attacks and attacks made against him are made with advantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kagain makes three attacks with his berserking greataxe.

action.name: Berserking Great Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 1d12 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: Kagain makes an attack with a melee weapon.

legendary.name: Berserk Whirlwind (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Kagain makes a weapon attack against every creature within 5 ft. of him.
